aka: The Odyssey of a Treasure: Napoleon’s War Treasure
宝藏的旅程：拿破仑的战争宝藏
this_title: L'Odyssée d'un trésor - Le trésor de guerre de Napoléon
trans_title: 宝藏的旅程：拿破仑的战利品
The Odyssey of a Treasure: Napoleon’s War Treasure
宝藏的旅程：拿破仑的战争宝藏
introduction: While leaving Paris in 1940, Hitler gives the order to plunder the Invalides: Napoleon's war trophies needs to be transferred to Berlin in order to adorn the grandiose museum that Hitler will build in his new Germania. But what happened to Napoleon's War Treasure?Producer: AB ProductionsDirector: Isabelle Gendre
chinese_title: 宝藏的旅程：拿破仑的战利品
foreign_title: L'Odyssée d'un trésor - Le trésor de guerre de Napoléon
